location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Stephen Babbington, Deputy Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the commands of the Bombay Government dated 12 May and 23 September 1811. The former conveyed a request from Aga Esmail Casvina, son of the late Hajee Khulull Khaun, for the payment of pension arrears, and that the Resident execute the original power of attorney. It notes in response that as Aga Esmail Casvina is currently at Sheraz [Shiraz], and that he will either need to travel to Bushire, or the power of attorney will need to be transferred to Sheraz for his request to be met.
